WRITING.TEXT: a fair amount, i showed him 2 pictures and said i wanted something similar, he took it from there and the sketched an idea. he made several alterations as he was tattooing.
Just wait. You won't be able to find any reputable artist who will tattoo underage. You'll end up with a terrible tat or hepatitis.

WRITING.TITLE: Good ways to find roommates to share an off campus house?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi all! I'm transferring to sb as a junior this upcoming fall, and I need housing. I would rather not live in a dorm, and I'm trying to find female roommates to share a house. I know about the stony brook roommate referral on the off campus housing site, but most of the posts are old. I don't really know anyone that goes to stony brook. Any ideas how I can find roommates? Thanks ahead of time!

WRITING.TEXT: Title explains it, will a nipple piercing mess with breast feeding years in the future? female, obviously.
ahhh a fellow hp fan. glad someone got it
hmmm...no, the tattoo artist did NOT warn me of any such thing. thanks for the info

WRITING.TITLE: Help! Part of my three week old tattoo has vanished! No, I'm not kidding!
WRITING.TEXT:
I got a tattoo at House of Colour in Bayshore, Ny, about three weeks ago. The tattoo is "All was well" and three stars on my right foot. It's very small(less than an inch tall) and finely lettered. It is still partially raised, and is not flaking or itching. I never once picked at it or scratched it, and put the ointment they gave me at the tattoo parlor on it at least once a day. Now, the middle line in the "a" is totally gone! In addition, an "s" is significantly fading. Wtf is going on? Did the tattoo place fuck up? Did I not take care of it correctly? Help!!!
Here is a shitty pic because it is very hard to take a picture of your own foot without covering it in shadow. Sorry it is upside down, I can't seem to get it to save properly after I rotate it. http://i.imgur.com/xoUw6.jpg
Thanks in advance!!
i love getting drunk by myself and refuse to see anything wrong with it. it's much more relaxing than drinking with people.
lovely color! Also where did you get the dress?
